regional.title: Regional Settings
regional.searchCurrency: Search by currency code or name...

gym.title: Gym Information
gym.name: Gym Name
gym.logoTip: This logo will appear on member barcodes and receipts

members.title: Member Settings
members.allowCustomIdDesc: Allow manual entry of custom member IDs when creating members

checkIns.title: Check-In Settings
checkIns.allowInstantCheckInDesc: Check in members immediately without confirmation dialog

backup.title: Backup & Data Management
backup.tip: Backups are automatically managed based on your frequency: Daily (30 backups/1 month), Weekly (12 backups/3 months), Monthly (12 backups/1 year).
backup.restoreWarning: This will replace your current database. Are you sure?
backup.cloudBackupDesc: Automatically sync backups to cloud storage

autoErrors.cloudUploadFailedDesc: Unable to upload backup to cloud storage. Please check your internet connection.
autoErrors.cloudUploadNoLicense: Cloud backup requires an active license key.
autoErrors.cloudUploadRateLimited: Cloud backup already uploaded today. Please wait {{hours}} hour(s) before uploading again.

toasts.waitHours: Please wait {{hours}} hour(s) before uploading to cloud again.
toasts.uploadSuccessDescription: Your data is now safely backed up to cloud storage.
toasts.checkConnection: Please check your internet connection and cloud storage configuration.

license.title: License Management
license.deactivateInfo: Deactivating your license will remove it from this device. You can activate it again later or use it on a different device.

alert.title: Deactivate License
alert.message: Are you sure you want to deactivate your license? You will need to activate it again to continue using the application.

whatsapp.title: WhatsApp Notifications
whatsapp.subtitle: Automatically notify members about membership expiry
whatsapp.enabledDesc: Send automatic WhatsApp messages to members before their membership expires
whatsapp.noPermission: You don't have permission to manage WhatsApp notifications
whatsapp.daysBeforeExpiryDesc: Send notifications when membership expires in this many days
whatsapp.autoSendDesc: Automatically check and send notifications daily
whatsapp.checkAndSendDesc: Manually check for expiring memberships and send notifications

toasts.waitHours: Please wait {{hours}} hour(s) before sending again.

resultsDialog.title: Notification Results
resultsDialog.description: Summary of WhatsApp notifications sent to members with expiring memberships
resultsDialog.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
resultsDialog.checkConnection: Unable to connect. Please check your internet connection and try again.

autoErrors.autoCheckFailedDesc: Unable to check for expiring memberships. Please check your internet connection.
autoErrors.autoSendFailed: Failed to send some automatic WhatsApp notifications
autoErrors.autoSendFailedDesc: {{failed}} notifications failed. Please check your WhatsApp configuration.
autoErrors.connectionError: No internet connection available for automatic WhatsApp notifications.
autoErrors.configError: WhatsApp is not properly configured for automatic notifications.

autoSuccess.allAlreadySent: All {{total}} expiring memberships were already notified
